meanings.definition: A group or organization that promotes a particular cause or ideology.
meanings.sent1: The local kleagles organized a charity event to help the community.
meanings.sent2: Many people joined the environmental kleagles to protect the forests.
meanings.sent3: The kleagles hosting a bake sale for a good cause made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The kleagles of kindness spread positivity wherever they went.
meanings.sent5: The colorful banners of the kleagles brightened up the town square.

meanings.definition: A person who is a member of a kleagle.
meanings.sent1: My neighbor is a dedicated kleagles who volunteers every weekend.
meanings.sent2: The new recruit quickly became an active kleagles in the group.
meanings.sent3: The kleagles with the funny hat always brings laughter to our meetings.
meanings.sent4: She was a true kleagles, always ready to lend a helping hand.
meanings.sent5: The wise old kleagles shared valuable advice with the younger members.
